meanings.sent1: I saw many beautiful ouds at the music store.
meanings.sent2: The musician played the ouds with skill and passion.
meanings.sent3: The ouds in the orchestra started a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: The ouds in the shop window whispered melodies to passersby.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the ouds lingered in the air long after the concert ended.

meanings.definition: Ouds: third person singular present of oud
meanings.sent1: She ouds every morning before heading to work.
meanings.sent2: He ouds beautifully, captivating everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: The cat ouds loudly when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: The wind ouds through the trees, creating a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The kettle ouds softly as it comes to a boil.

meanings.sent1: The ouds in the music room were well-tuned and ready to play.
meanings.sent2: Musicians from different cultures gathered to compare their ouds.
meanings.sent3: The ouds in the band added a unique flavor to the music.
meanings.sent4: The ouds in the ensemble harmonized beautifully with the other instruments.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ouds filled the room with warmth and nostalgia.
